title: Piaf
creator_credit: Films Feuer and Martin, Martin Productions, Cy Feuer and Guy Casaril
brief_description: Biographical film adapted from the book “Piaf” by Simone Berteaut about Edith Piaf, the world renowned French torch singer also known as the “sparrow”. Piaf is still much loved and admired today with her unique voice and style being reinterpreted on stage and film across the world. This portrayal includes several of her original recordings including La Vie En Rose. Stars Brigitte Ariel as Piaf with Pascale Christophe, Pierre Vernier, Jacques Duby, Anouk Ferjac, Guy Trejan.
